name: UtahPublicMeetings
0:
”Alexa, ask utah public meetings meetings in zipcode 84111”
”Alexa, ask utah public meetings get upcoming meetings for city of Salt Lake City”
”Alexa, ask utah public meetings get todays meetings for zipcode 84111”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: utah public meetings
des:
Keep up with important meetings, events, and decisions in your community. This public meeting notice skill will provide you with location, time, date, and information about upcoming public meetings in the state of Utah. Search by city or zip code.

Here are some of the ways you can use the skill.

Find events by city, just say:
Alexa, ask utah public meetings get upcoming meetings for city of Ogden.

Search by zip code
Alexa, ask utah public meetings get upcoming meetings for zipcode 84401.

Get today’s events
Alexa, ask utah public meetings get today's meetings for city of South Jordan.

Search for a specific day
Alexa, ask utah public meetings get meetings for city Provo on June 7th.

Public Meeting Notice is personalized to deliver you the events you care about the most.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
